title: GreenFi
description: GreenFi is a platform for community loan management in rural communities with the aim of utilitising the idea of eco-credit for environmental restoration.

title: Hairdressers Connect
description: Hairdressers Connect is a web-app network for stylists. It allows users to connect with one another, create a virtual CV and view portfolio items via Instagram.

title: T1Exercise
description: T1Exercise is a mobile application for managing diabetes blood sugar levels with exercise recommendations in order to encourage safe and empowering exercise.

title: Loinnir
description: Loinnir is an Irish-language social network. It uses location-based services to match-make users into communities and provide discussion topics

title: Wedder
description: Wedder is a small React app to provide updates on a location's weather forecast in a humorous manner using Irish colloquialisms.

title: Insurance Web App
description: This is a simple React desktop-based exercise I had to make for a job interview. It turned out pretty fluid and shows some basic functions for a client.

title: Irish Nouns
description: Irish Nouns is an Irish language game app. It gives the user a choice of topic, and presents words for the user to guess the gender while keeping a score.

title: Tearma
description: Tearma is an Irish language dictionary app. It was created as a client for a man-in-the-middle service which converts HTML markup to JSON.

title: Snapchat Filters
description: Open-source Git repository to mimic augmented reality filters seen in the popular app Snapchat using OpenCV and image processing techniques.
